Title shown at top of help panel when a user reviews their question before submitting.

Text to show in the help panel when a user is submitting their question. $1 is a link to the community help desk. $2 is the username of the user submitting the question.

Label for a field displaying the user's email in the help panel.

Note to display to user that they will be emailed when someone replies to them.

Label to show above the are where a user may write a question in the help panel.

Template to use for questions posted to community help desk via the help panel when the article title is not included in the message.

Template to use for questions posted to community help desk via the help panel when the article title is included in the message. $1 is a page title.

Confirmation to the user that they will receive an email notification when a response is posted.

Confirmation to the user that they will receive an on-wiki notification when a response is posted. Also inform the user that they will receive an email notification if they confirm their email. Parameters:
* $1 - Link to Special:Notifications ("{{int:growthexperiments-help-panel-notifications-link-text}}")
* $2 - Link to Special:ConfirmEmail ("{{int:growthexperiments-help-panel-confirm-email-link-text}}").
